keyFacts: A civil lawsuit was filed against Jeffrey Epstein in January 2020, with media coverage in the NY Daily News, NY Post, The Sun, and Daily Mail.
The legal team was actively investigating the case, planning to interview the victim and contact witnesses including the victim's mother, M, Jean-Paul, Howie Simon, Larkin, Dr. Cabe, and John.
The case was assigned to Judge John Koeltl and Magistrate Judge Barbara Moses in the SDNY.
The email chain shows detailed coordination between attorney Robert Glassman and investigators to schedule interviews and plan investigative steps in late 2019 and early 2020.
